citation: Tasmanian Health Organisations (Tasmanian Health Service) Order 2015 (Tas)
text:
Tasmanian Health Organisations (Tasmanian Health Service) Order 2015

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 8 of the Tasmanian Health Organisations Act 2011 .

13 April 2015

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Health

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Tasmanian Health Organisations (Tasmanian Health Service) Order 2015 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2015.

3. Amalgamation of Tasmanian Health Organisations
        (1) Tasmanian Health Organisation – South and Tasmanian Health Organisation – North West are amalgamated into Tasmanian Health Organisation – North.
        (2) For the purpose of the amalgamation referred to in subclause (1) –
                (a) Schedule 1 to the Tasmanian Health Organisations Act 2011 is amended –
                        (i) by omitting "Tasmanian Health Organisation – South" and "Tasmanian Health Organisation – North West"; and
                        (ii) by altering the name of "Tasmanian Health Organisation – North" to "Tasmanian Health Service"; and
                (b) Schedule 2 to the Tasmanian Health Organisations Act 2011 is amended –
                        (i) by omitting the heading to the Schedule and substituting "OPERATIONAL AREA OF TASMANIAN HEALTH SERVICE"; and
                        (ii) by omitting Parts 1, 2 and 3 and substituting "All of Tasmania."; and
                (c) the assets and liabilities of Tasmanian Health Organisation – South and Tasmanian Health Organisation – North West are transferred to the Tasmanian Health Organisation known as the Tasmanian Health Service.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 April 2015

This order is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
